name: hvmv-scrapper
description: A template for kick starting a Cloudflare Workers project

scripts.build: webpack --progress --mode production # Create minified output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.build-dev: webpack --progress --mode none # Creates readable output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.build-all: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build

author: Jan Schmidt <me@jnschmdt.de>
